summary: This document appears to be a Yahoo! account management record for an account associated with Jeffrey Epstein, showing registration details, contact information, and linked email addresses. It provides evidence of Epstein's digital presence and contact information in the early 2000s.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as the full name associated with the Yahoo! account 'jeeproject', with addresses in New York.

events.title: Yahoo! account creation
events.description: The Yahoo! account 'jeeproject' was created, associated with Jeffrey Epstein and his contact information.

locations: 457 Madison Ave., 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was associated with the Yahoo! account 'jeeproject' created on April 2, 2001.
The account was linked to the email addresses jeeproject@yahoo.com and jeevacation@gmail.com.
Epstein's listed address was 457 Madison Ave., 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022.
The account used the alternate identity 'jeffrey.newyork'.
This document provides digital footprint evidence connecting Epstein to specific online accounts and contact information.
